entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bécancour

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
